effect.name: Rectangle Inner Border
effect.description: Adds a border with custom (pixel) size to the object. Object size must be specified.
effect.author: Original by bybyblue, Edit and DX11 Port by NaitorStudios
effect.parameter: Object Width oWidth Width of the object the shader is applied to. float edit 32 //0 //999999
Object Height oHeight Height of the object the shader is applied to. float edit 32 //0 //999999
Border Size bSize Size of the border for the rectangle around the object (it's based on the defined object size). float spin 2 //0 //999999
